Experience.title: Web Specialist
Resp: Delivers timely Web enhancements that improve performance and conversion rates.
Responsible for the design and development of web pages, graphics, multimedia GUIs.
Responsible for designing and maintaining sites using HTML/XHTML, CSS, JavaScript, and other programming tools to follow customer branding standards.
Assists in managing strategies and tactics to achieve Search Engine Optimization (SEO), and guides marketing department in industry best practices relating to SEO.

Experience.title: Web Designer and Developer
Resp: Take designs and translate them into a functional website.
Redesigning website to be more user-centered.

Experience.title: Web Developer
Resp: Collaborated with a Designer and Content Strategist to translate designs and strategy into a working site.
Tested Heartoscope.org responsiveness website and made changes to make site responsive.
Using Google Lighthouse, addressed several audits to make site accessible and mobile optimized while incorporating SEO strategies.
